languages.text: "Это ритуалы, принятые среди пилотов Имперских Рыцарей моего мира. Не могу не отметить, с какой дипломатичностью ты высказал подозрение, что я отклоняюсь от догм".
"They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."
languages.original_text: "Это ритуалы, принятые среди пилотов Имперских Рыцарей моего мира. Не могу не отметить, с какой дипломатичностью ты высказал подозрение, что я отклоняюсь от догм".

traits.locale_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这些祈祷来自我的世界，是帝国骑士的驾驶员进行的祈祷。你以非常委婉的方式，表达了对我偏离教条行为的怀疑，我必须对此表示赞赏。”
languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

traits.locale_text: “这些祈祷来自我的世界，是帝国骑士的飞行员进行的祈祷。你以非常委婉的方式，表达了对我偏离教条行为的怀疑，我必须对此表示赞赏。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Son ritos de los Caballeros Imperiales pilotos de mi mundo. Debo felicitarle por la delicadeza con la que ha sugerido que me estaba desviando del dogma».
languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

traits.locale_text: «Son ritos de los Caballeros Imperiales pilotos de mi mundo. Debo felicitarle por la delicadeza con la que ha sugerido que me estaba desviando del dogma».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それらは私の惑星のインペリアルナイトのパイロットが行う儀式だ。私が教義から外れたことを行っているのではないかという疑念を表明したあなたの繊細さは、称賛に値しよう」
languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

traits.locale_text: 「それらは私の惑星のインペリアルナイトのパイロットが行う儀式だ。私が教義から外れたことを行っているのではないかという疑念を表明したあなたの繊細さは、称賛に値しよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das sind Riten der imperialen Ritter-Piloten meiner Welt. Ich muss Euch für das Feingefühl loben, mit dem Ihr Euren Verdacht, ich würde vom Dogma abweichen, ausgedrückt habt."
languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind Riten der imperialen Ritter-Piloten meiner Welt. Ich muss Euch für das Feingefühl loben, mit dem Ihr Euren Verdacht, ich würde vom Dogma abweichen, ausgedrückt habt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont là les rites des pilotes de Chevaliers Impériaux de mon monde. Permettez-moi néanmoins de vous féliciter pour la délicatesse avec laquelle vous m'avez soupçonné de m'écarter du dogme. »
languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont là les rites des pilotes de Chevaliers Impériaux de mon monde. Permettez-moi néanmoins de vous féliciter pour la délicatesse avec laquelle vous m'avez soupçonné de m'écarter du dogme. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

languages.text: "Dünyamdaki İmparatorluk Şövalyesi pilotlarının gerçekleştirdiği ayinler bunlar. Dogmadan sapmama ilişkin şüphelerini ifade etmendeki inceliği takdir ettim ama."
languages.original_text: "They are rites performed by the Imperial Knight pilots of my world. I must commend you on the delicacy with which you expressed your suspicion that I was deviating from dogma."

traits.locale_text: "Dünyamdaki İmparatorluk Şövalyesi pilotları tarafından gerçekleştirilen ayinler bunlar. Dogmadan sapmama ilişkin şüphelerini ifade etmendeki nezaketinden dolayı tebrik ederim ama."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
